node.display_long_description:
Build Your Incredible Machine - Gravity Lab would like to introduce our new range of gravity modifying appliances!

Currently awaiting regulatory approval, we invite you to visit our testing facility and give them a go! We have prepared a selection of test scenarios for you and we are certain you can solve them!

Features:
- 30 mind bending puzzles, many with 3 variations each
- Integrated level editor and workshop for community created levels
- Multiple locomotion and comfort options including teleport, joystick locomotion and miniature mode for seated play
- Cloud Sync and Leaderboards

Please be aware that strong gravitational forces can cause a looming feeling of being observed! Never look directly at the emitted particles! While we tried our best to avoid the creation of micro wormholes, please never try to stack gravitational objects. All damages to the time and space continuum and all involved repair costs will be passed on to you!

-- Gravity Lab Management

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
The Micro Star Update - v1.14.0

- Added 6 new Micro Star Levels
- Changed Gravity Modifier Logic. Now using the same modifier effect on an item toggles the effect
- Improved visuals in Micro Star environment
- Bugfix for level editor not displaying own custom levels in some circumstances

nodes.title: September Update 1.11.0
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone,

I have just pushed the September Update for Gravity Lab. It adds a new alternate activation mechanic for buttons as well as much better font rendering. These were the biggest points of critique after launch, so if they bothered you, please check out this update :).

There is also a bunch of other fixes/additions. Here is the full changelog:

September Update 1.11.0

- New button activation mechanic
- New free locomotion mode
- Improved font rendering
- Support for custom radio stations
- Added area to practice throwing/deleting items in reception
- Fixed hand animation
- Potential fix for game freezing due to low memory
- New glass shader
- Minor bug fixes

nodes.title: Over 100.000 puzzles solved in Gravity Lab
nodes.body_text:
Gravity Lab players have solved over 100.000 puzzles since the game has launched! This is an amazing milestone. Thank you!

-=Roadmap=-
I think now is a great time to share a bit about what the future will bring. Head over to gravitylab-game.com/roadmap for the most up to date info!

-=Bug Fixes / Improvements=-
I have created a simple system for players to report bugs (in addition to already available ways like email). Head to gravitylab-game.com/bugs to submit any reports and suggestions

-=Consider Leaving a Review=-
Gravity Lab is a small indie title and as it turns out, puzzle games don't really have a wide mass market appeal that I have hoped.
Anyway, if you enjoy the game, please consider leaving a rating and/or review for it. It really helps.


That is all for now. As always, thank you for playing the game. You can reach out to me any time at gravitylab@mark-schramm.com


Cheers,
Mark

node.reviewDescription: Really like the the game but another game with no multiple user saved game !!!!!  Another game I can't really share with my wife!! Knowing Oculus quest 2 still don't allow multiple user, it's very annoying not being possible to save different user in the game. it's the 3rd game like that. Ghost Giant and Fisherman's tale are like that too.

website_page_meta.description: Build your incredible machine and solve physics puzzles with gravity bending appliances! Gravity Lab's new lunar testing facility welcomes you to try out our standardized testing scenarios - now designed for humans!
website_page_meta.title: Gravity Lab · Oculus Quest
